Low-Level Design (LLD)

Design patterns, SOLID principles, object-oriented design, and interview problems.

Topics

  1. LLD Fundamentals - SOLID principles, design principles, and OOP concepts
  2. Creational Patterns - Singleton, Factory, Builder, Prototype, and Abstract Factory
  3. Structural Patterns - Adapter, Decorator, Proxy, Composite, and Facade
  4. Behavioral Patterns - Observer, Strategy, Command, State, and Template Method
  5. LLD Interview Problems 1 - Parking lot, elevator system, and library management
  6. LLD Interview Problems 2 - ATM, movie ticket booking, and chess game
  7. Concurrency Patterns - Thread-safe patterns, producer-consumer, and reader-writer
